## AppLeaveAction type

Possible actions to return from a [AppLeaveHandler](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.appleavehandler.md)

See [AppLeaveConfirmAction](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.appleaveconfirmaction.md) and [AppLeaveDefaultAction](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.appleavedefaultaction.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AppLeaveAction = AppLeaveDefaultAction | AppLeaveConfirmAction;
```
